verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> the things which we are <S%G3004>saying,<s%> the main <S%G2774>point<s%> is <S%G2192>this.<s%> We have <S%G5108>such<s%> a high <S%G749>priest,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2523>sat<s%> down <S%G1722>on<s%> the right <S%G1188>hand<s%> of the <S%G2362>throne<s%> of the <S%G3172>Majesty<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3772>heavens,<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> high <S%G749>priest<s%> is <S%G2525>appointed<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G4374>offer<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G1435>gifts<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2378>sacrifices.<s%> <S%G3606>Therefore<s%> it is <S%G316>necessary<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> this high <S%G5126>priest<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5100>something<s%> to <S%G4374>offer.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1487%G99999>if<s%> he <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G1093>earth,<s%> he <S%G2258>would<s%> <S%G3761%G99999>not<s%> <S%G2258>be<s%> a <S%G2409>priest<s%> at <S%G5607>all,<s%> seeing there are <S%G2409>priests<s%> who <S%G4374>offer<s%> the <S%G1435>gifts<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G3551>law;<s%>

<S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G3000>serve<s%> a <S%G5262>copy<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4639>shadow<s%> of the heavenly <S%G2032>things,<s%> even <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> was warned by <S%G5537>God<s%> when he was <S%G3195>about<s%> to <S%G2005>make<s%> the <S%G4633>tabernacle,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G5346>he<s%> <S%G3708>said,<s%> "See, you shall <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G3956>everything<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G5179>pattern<s%> that was <S%G1166>shown<s%> to <S%G4671>you<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the <S%G3735>mountain.<s%>"

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3570>now<s%> he has obtained <S%G5177>a<s%> more <S%G1313>excellent<s%> <S%G3009>ministry,<s%> by so <S%G3745>much<s%> <S%G5177>as<s%> he <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> the <S%G3316>mediator<s%> of a <S%G2909>better<s%> <S%G1242>covenant,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> on <S%G2909>better<s%> <S%G1860>promises<s%> has been given as <S%G3549>law.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%> covenant had <S%G2258>been<s%> <S%G273>faultless,<s%> then <S%G3756%G99999>no<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> would have been <S%G2212>sought<s%> for a <S%G1208>second.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> finding <S%G3201>fault<s%> with <S%G846>them,<s%> he <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2400>"Behold,<s%> the <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G2064>come,<s%>" <S%G3004>says<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2532>"that<s%> I will <S%G4931>make<s%> <S%G1242>a<s%> <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1242>covenant<s%> <S%G1909>with<s%> the <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1909>with<s%> the <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G2448>Judah;<s%>

<S%G3756>not<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G1242>covenant<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> I <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G3962>with<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3962>fathers,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G3450>I<s%> <S%G1949>took<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> by the <S%G5495>hand<s%> to <S%G1806>lead<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1806>out<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G125>Egypt;<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G1696>continue<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G1242>covenant,<s%> and <S%G2504>I<s%> <S%G272>disregarded<s%> <S%G272><s%> <S%G846>them,<s%>" <S%G3004>says<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

<S%G3754>"For<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> is the <S%G1242>covenant<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> I will <S%G1303>make<s%> with the <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel.<s%> <S%G3326>After<s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%>" <S%G3004>says<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord;<s%> "I <S%G1924>will<s%> <S%G1325>put<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3551>laws<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G1271>mind,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> I will also <S%G1924>write<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2588>heart.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> I will <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> will <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G3427>my<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G2992>people.<s%>

They <S%G1321>will<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1321>teach<s%> every <S%G1538>man<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> fellow <S%G4139>citizen,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> every <S%G1538>man<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brother,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1097><s%> 'Know the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%>' <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> will <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3165>me,<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G575>from<s%> their <S%G3398>least<s%> <S%G2193>to<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G846>greatest.<s%>

<S%G1722>In<s%> that he <S%G3004>says,<s%> "A <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G3822>covenant,<s%>" he has made the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G3822>old.<s%> <S%G1161>But<s%> that which is becoming <S%G3822>old<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> grows <S%G1095>aged<s%> is <S%G1451>near<s%> to vanishing <S%G854>away.<s%>
